conversations.content: I really liked the T-shirt I bought last month. Could you please buy two more for me?

<function_thought>
To accomplish the task, we need to first view the order history to find the product ID of the T-shirt Emma bought last month. Then, we can search for the product using the product ID, add it to the cart, and finally checkout the selected cart.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[view_order_history()]</function_call>
